reasoning: Achalasia is a rare primary esophageal motility disorder with incidence estimated at ~1 per 100,000 person-years globally. Limited epidemiological data from systematic registries; estimates based on clinical case series and hospital-based studies.
source: Ates F et al. (2012). Achalasia: clinical presentation, diagnosis, and treatment. Curr Opin Gastroenterol. 28(4):368-376
